cause.description:
The Nationaisozialistische Partei Deutschland(National Socialist Party of Germany) is a party determined to deport all non white-protestents of Germany. The scary thing is that this party is gaining support in Eastern Germany and has actually gotten some seats in the German parliment. Our hope is to raise awarness of the wrong doings and policies of this terrible party determined to set Germany back 60 years into a time of turmoil.
1. The NPD is wrong.
2. Human Rights in Germany must not be altered.
cause.mission: raise awareness of the wrong doings and bad policies of the Nationaisozialistische Partei Deutschland.
cause.name: Stop The Nationaisozialistische Partei Deutschland
